resources.string: You can also pay with a new card from here
Click the "Pay Now" button, then you will be directed to the Akulaku Payment Center page.
Select the desired installment tenor, then Login to your Akulaku account by entering your mobile number and password.
Enter the verification code (OTP) that has been sent to your mobile number, then click the "Next" button.
A confirmation page will be shown to you, then you can finish your transaction.
Go to an Alfamart, Alfamidi, or Dan+Dan store near you and provide the cashier with the Payment Code number.
The cashier will then confirm the transaction by asking for the transaction amount and the merchant name.
Confirm the payment with the cashier to proceed payment.
Your transaction is successful! You should be receiving an email confirming your payment. Please keep your payment receipt just in case you need help via support.
Pay from any Alfamart, Alfamidi, or Dan+Dan outlet
After confirming your payment, we will issue you a unique Payment Code number.
Note down your Payment Code and total amount. Don\'t worry, we will also mail you a copy of this payment instructions to your email.
Go to an Alfamart, Alfamidi, or Dan+Dan store near you and provide the cashier with the Payment Code number.
The cashier will then confirm the transaction by asking for the transaction amount and the merchant name.
Confirm the payment with the cashier to proceed payment.
Your transaction is successful! You should be receiving an email confirming your payment. Please keep your payment receipt just in case you need help via support.
Something went wrong. Please try later.
You will receive an unique account number and instructions on how to pay (You can receive instructions via email if you input your mail address above).
Please complete payment through the Prima(BCA), ATM Bersama(Mandiri), or Alto(Permata) ATM network.
Once payment is complete, you will receive a confirmation email.
On the main menu, Choose Other Transaction.
Enter your Payment Code (11 digit code) and press Correct.
Enter full amount to be paid and press Correct.
Your payment details will appear on the confirmation page. If information is correct press Yes.
Choose Transfer to BCA Virtual Account.
Input BCA Virtual Account Number or Choose from Transfer List and click Continue.
Amount to be paid, account number and Merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page, if information is right click Continue.
Get your BCA token and input KEYBCA Response APPLI 1 and click Submit.
You will be redirected to BCA KlikPay once you click Confirm Payment button.

After Login to your BCA Klikpay Account by entering your email address and password, it will display transaction information such as merchant name, transaction time, and amount to be paid. Choose the type of payment KlikBCA or BCA Card for the transaction.
To authorize payment with BCA KlikPay, press the Send OTP button, and you will receive an OTP (One Time Password) code sent via SMS to your mobile phone. Enter the OTP code in the fields provided.

If your OTP code is correct, your payment will be processed immediately and your account balance (for KlikBCA payment type) or your BCA Card limit (for BCA Card payment type) will be reduced according to amount of transaction value.
Your transaction success status will appear on the transaction screen and you will receive a notification email.
For more information about BCA KlikPay please contact Halo BCA at (021) 1500888 or visit http://klikbca.com/KlikPay/klikpay.html.
Log in to your BCA Mobile app.
Choose m-BCA, then input your m-BCA access code
Choose m-Transfer, then choose BCA Virtual Account.
Input Virtual Account Number or choose an existing account from Daftar Transfer.
Payment is finished. Save the notification as your payment receipt.
On the main menu, choose Others
Enter the Payment Account Number and press Yes
Enter the full amount to be paid and press Correct
Your payment details will appear on the confirmation page. If the information is correct press Yes
Go to https://ibank.bni.co.id and then click Login.
Continue login with your User ID and Password.
Click Transfer and then Add Favorite Account and choose Antar Rekening BNI.
Enter account name, account number, and email and then click Continue.
Input the Authentification Code from your token and then click Continue.
Back to main menu and select Transfer and then Transfer Antar Rekening BNI.
Pick the account that you just created in the previous step as Rekening Tujuan and fill in the rest before clicking Continue.
Check whether the details are correct, if they are, please input the Authentification Code and click Continue and you are done.
Open the BNI Mobile Banking app and login.
Enter account numbers, an then click Continue.
Input the Transaction Password and then click Continue and you are done.
Please make sure that you have a User ID for BRI e-Pay and have registered for mTOKEN before going through with the payment
To obtain a User ID for BRI e-Pay, please register at the nearest BRI ATM.
Please visit the nearest BRI branch office to register the mTOKEN.
Payment via BRI e-Pay will be processed online and your BRI bank account balance will be deducted automatically based on your total amount.
Your transaction will be cancelled if payment is not completed within 2 hours.
Are you sure want to leave this page?
Are you sure to delete this card?
The request to attach Nuclide could not reach Metro Bundler!
Unable to download JS bundle. Did you forget to start the development server or connect your device?
Unable to connect with remote debugger
Please make sure that you have a User ID for CIMB Clicks and have registered your mPIN before going through with the payment.
Transaction will be cancelled if payment is not completed within 2 hours.
Please make sure that there is no pop-up blocker on your browser.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Make sure payment has been completed within the GO-JEK app.
Make sure the QR code successfully scanned and payment has been completed within the GO-JEK app.
Billpay code was copied to clipboard
Company code was copied to clipboard
Danamon Online Banking must be completed through Danamon\'s website.
Please make sure you have a User ID for Danamon Online Banking before going through the payment.
Enter Danamon Online Banking User ID and Password and select the source of fund
Check detail transaction and enter Token Code and klik Next.
Payment confirmation will be displayed and payment is completed. Keep the merchant reference and payment reference no. and klik Next to return to merchant website.
Transaction cannot be processed. Make sure your payment information is correct
Sorry, payment method is not enabled
We\'ll send payment instruction to mail.
Transaction cannot be proccessed. Please try again or try another payment method.
Gross amount is not equal to the sum of item details
Transaction failed. Your transaction got declined by T-Cash.
Transaction is unsuccessful. Please try again with another card or with a different payment method.
Your payment can\'t be processed. Please make sure you have entered the correct payment.
Your order are no longer available.
We are experiencing some unexpected system error. Please try again.
We are having issues connecting to the payment provider. Please try again.
Failed to load QR code. Please try again.
Sorry, the order id already utilized
Check your payment details then tap Pay and your transaction is Done.
Note: Scan QR button won\'t appear if your GO-PAY balance is less than Rp 10,000.
QR code will appear on the next page to be scanned.
Open GO-JEK app on your phone.
Point your camera to the QR Code.
Check your payment details in GO-JEK app and then tap Pay.
How much points you want to redeem?
After confirming your payment, we will issue you a unique Payment Code number.
Note down your Payment Code and total amount. Don\'t worry, we will also mail you a copy of the payment instructions.
Go to an Indomaret store near you and provide the cashier with the Payment Code number or barcode to be scanned.
The cashier will then confirm the transaction by asking for the transaction amount and the merchant name.
Confirm the payment with the cashier.
Your transaction is successful! You should be receiving an email confirming your payment. Please keep your Indomaret payment receipt just in case you need help via support.
Indosat number must not be empty.
Input your registered indosat phone number.
Make sure you have sufficient funds in your account.
You will receive an USSD message from Indosat to complete transaction via Dompetku app.
IMPORTANT! After confirming your payment, you won’t be able to change payment method
Install GO-JEK App from Play Store
On the main menu, choose Other Transaction.
Enter 009 (Bank BNI code) and choose Correct.
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press Correct.
Enter the full amount to be paid and press Correct. If the amount entered is not the same as the invoiced amount, the transaction will be declined.
Your payment details will appear on the confirmation page. If the information is right press Correct.
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press Correct.
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is right, press Correct.
On the main menu, choose Others.
Enter 009 (Bank BNI code) and 16 digit Account No. and press Correct
Enter 013 and 16 digit Account No. and press Correct.
Enter the full amount to be paid and press Correct. If the amount entered is not the same as the invoiced amount, the transaction will be declined.
Empty the transfer reference number and press Correct.
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is right, press Correct.
Ensure there is Alto logo in the back of your ATM card
Ensure there is ATM Bersama logo in the back of your ATM card.
Ensure there is Prima logo in the back of your ATM card.
Please make sure that the UserID is active and registered at BCA.
Please continue the payment through KlikBCA by opening http://klikbca.com/ on a separate window or tab, using the same User ID that you entered below.
On the main menu, choose Other Transaction.
Enter 009 (Bank BNI code) and choose Correct.
Enter the full amount to be paid and press Correct. If the amount entered is not the same as the invoiced amount, the transaction will be declined.
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press Correct.
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is right, press Correct.
After confirming your payment, we will issue you a unique Payment Code number.
Note down your Payment Code and total amount. We will send you the payment code along with payment instructions to your email address.
Go to a Kioson outlet near you and provide the cashier with the Payment Code.
The cashier will open kioson Cash Point, on the menu chasier will select Keagenan.
Enter your Payment Code and get the payment details.
Submit payment and print the receipt.
Your transaction is successful! You should be receiving an email confirming your payment. Please keep your payment receipt just in case you need help via support.
Please continue the payment process via KlikBCA by opening http://klikbca.com/ on your browser.
Please make sure that the User ID is active and registered at BCA.
Please continue the payment through KlikBCA by opening http://klikbca.com/ on your browser, using the same User ID that you entered above.
Something went wrong. Please try later
Make sure you have registered your mobile phone number for LINE Pay e-cash / mandiri e-cash.
Enter your phone number and PIN.
Please wait for an SMS from LINE Pay e-cash / mandiri e-cash that contains your One Time Password (OTP).
Enter the 6 digit OTP, then click Pay to make payment.
If you haven\'t received the OTP or the OTP has expired, click Cancel and retry your transaction.
1.\tActivate your Mandiri token by pressing [img src=ic_mandiri_instrcn/].
4.\tEnter input 1 and press [img src=ic_mandiri_instrcn/] for 3 seconds.
5.\tEnter input 2 and press [img src=ic_mandiri_instrcn/] for 3 seconds.
6.\tEnter input 3 and press [img src=ic_mandiri_instrcn/] for 3 seconds.
7.\tPut the response code on your Mandiri token into the challenge token field.
On the main menu, Choose Pay/Buy.
Enter 70012 (Midtrans company code) and press Correct.
Enter your Payment code and press Correct.
Your payment details will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is correct press Yes.
From the main menu choose Payment, then choose Multi Payment.
Select your account in From Account, then Billing Name select Midtrans.
Enter the Payment Code and you will receive your payment details.
Confirm your payment using your Mandiri Token.
The CVV is a 3 (or 6) digit number security code printed on the back of your card.
Sorry, a problem occurs. Please try again or try another payment method
Process failed. Re-check your card details or use another card.
Merchant base url cannot be null or empty, if you implement your own token storage. Please set merchant base_url to SDK
Transaction cannot be proccessed. Make sure your payment informations is correct
Transaction denied! Please try again or try another payment method.
Transaction Failed. Re-check your card details or use another card.
There are no enabled payment methods
Save your card for faster checkout process.
Client key and context cannot be null or empty. Please set the client key and context to SDK
Unfortunately, we couldn\'t find GO-JEK app installed on your phone.
Network not available! Please try later.
GO-JEK app is required for this payment method.
Make sure you have GO-JEK app installed on your phone and have GO-PAY balance more than Rp 10,000.
SMS charges may be applied for this payment method
Key token device is required for this payment method.
This card is not applicable for this transaction, please use another card.
Pay through ATM with Alto logo
Pay through ATM with ATM Bersama logo
Pay through ATM with Prima logo
Pay from BCA ATMs or internet banking
Pay from BNI ATMs or internet banking
Pay from Mandiri ATMs or internet banking
Pay from Permata ATMs or internet banking
Pay from an Alfamart, Alfamidi, or Dan+Dan outlet.
Pay from ATM Bersama, Prima or Alto
Pay with VISA, MasterCard, JCB or AMEX
Pay with VISA, MasterCard or JCB
Pay with VISA, MasterCard or AMEX
Pay with your Danamon Online Banking Account
Pay through your Mandiri Clickpay account
Pay with your LINE Pay e-cash / mandiri e-cash account
Pay through your Telkomsel Cash account
Can\'t open the page, please enable the payment channel.
On the main menu, Choose Other Transaction.
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press Correct.
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on confirmation page. If the confirmation page is right, press Correct.
Choose your payment account and press Correct.
Pay through all bank ATMs with Alto logo
Pay through all bank ATMs with ATM Bersama logo
Pay through all bank ATMs with Prima logo
You can pay partly using redemption of BNI Reward Points through your credit card
You can pay partly through the redemption of Mandiri Fiestpoin through your Mandiri credit / debit card.
We will securely save your card details so you can reuse them later.
Card details above will be saved to help your future transactions.
Save your time by adding credit card that can be used for every transaction
Send a text message to Telkomsel, type TOKEN <PIN>, send to 2828.
Input the token sent from Telkomsel\'s reply into T-CASH TOKEN field.
Your transaction will expire unless you complete your payment in 30 minutes.

This request too long process. Please check your connection.
This program cannot be combined with BNI credit card installment program.
\"Hemat hingga 100% dengan BNI Reward Points\" program will directly deduct the points on transaction.

If transaction is cancelled completely, credit and reward points will be refunded to customer\'s credit card. If transaction is cancelled partially, transaction that will be refunded first is the credit card transaction, after that it will be refunded from the points.
Card holder\'s reward points that have been converted into Rupiah can be seen when card holder chooses to use BNI Reward Points by clicking \"BNI Reward Points\" button.
Card holder can choose how many points they would like to redeem. There is no minimum point to redeem.
Payment for reward points to merchant is the same as regular card payment.
Please enter valid email or leave it empty
Please enter valid phone number or leave it empty
Dial *123*120# with a registered XL phone number.
You will receive an SMS confirmation from XL.
Sorry, the Android camera encountered a problem. You may need to restart the device.
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
